banker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who works in a bank in an important position
banker.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the player who is in charge of the money in some gambling games
banker.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who works in the management of a bank
banker.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a senior Swiss banker who sits on many company boards
banker.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an organization that performs banking activities
banker.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: GE Capital is a very skilled banker.
